Name mapping:
[Usecase]		[file_name]	[control text]
Music playback: 	sp-music	"SP Music"
Ringtone: 		sp-ringtone 	"SP Ringtone"
Voice: 			sp-voice 	"SP Voice"
Calibration: 		sp-cali		"SP Cali"

Version:
Nov 27th, 2018 - From YZ.Dong
comments: Updated by YZ for buzz noise fix.

Nov 14th, 2018 - From YZ.Dong
comments: Updated by YZ for new tuning.

Nov 5th, 2018 - From YZ.Dong
comments: Initial version for heart.
